heading: Creative Companion
content: Meet your server's new best friend! Amina brings boundless energy, quirky humor, and creative flair to every interaction. She's always ready for an adventure!

heading: Playful & Protective
content: While she loves to joke around, Amina takes her server duties seriously. She's fiercely protective of her communities and works hard to keep them safe and fun!

heading: Growing & Learning
content: Like any creative soul, Amina is constantly evolving! She's currently in development, with new features being added regularly. Join us in shaping her future!

heading: Community-Driven Design
content: Amina believes in the power of friendship! Her features are shaped by community feedback and contributions. Every suggestion helps her grow!
